class core.agent_view.agent_view.PayrollView(**kwargs)¶

Bases: django.contrib.auth.mixins.LoginRequiredMixin, django.views.generic.base.View

Renders a payroll view for employee with role as agent.

Calls a SP which is reponsible for fetching payroll data for the employee.
